import { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; const Insert=()=>{ const [input,setInput]=useState({}); const handleInput=(e)=>{ let name=e.target.name; let value=e.target.value; setInput(values=>({...values, [name]:value})); } const handleSubmit=()=>{ let url="http://localhost:8000/task/insert"; axios.post(url,input).then((res)=>{ alert("Task saved successfully") console.log(res); }) } return(<>

Assign Tasks



) } export default Insert;
